definition: to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: Daredevil couple decided to vacation far out.
sentences.chinese: 冒失鬼夫婦決定遠出旅遊度假。

sentences.english: Don't be rash, wear the helmet.
sentences.chinese: 別作冒失鬼，請戴安全帽。

sentences.english: He is a very dangerous loose cannon .
sentences.chinese: 他是個很危險的冒失鬼。

sentences.english: Do you like The Beauty and the Bold ?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡《美人與冒失鬼》嗎？

sentences.english: Forget my daredevil sister practically dangling off the Cliffs of Moher.
sentences.chinese: 忘卻了我那個冒失鬼妹妹幾乎從莫赫山的峭壁跌落。

sentences.english: Daredevil will be ready before breakfast handed it to his wife.
sentences.chinese: 冒失鬼將準備好的早餐遞到了妻子面前。

sentences.english: As a teenager, he joined the Army, where he earned his nickname Hazard.
sentences.chinese: 他在十多歲時參軍，就在那時得了個外號“冒失鬼”。

definition: carelessly and haphazardly/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
